result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul L Wolfe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs to be paid at $25.00 per month commencing 04/15/16 and each month thereafter or penalty of 11 days jail for non-payment.

Costs to be included with fine payments.

**Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Paul L Wolfe in court with Attorney Nicole Williams Buttery.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Natalie Schiferl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a no contest plea to Count #1.   Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Williams Buttery makes statements regarding sentencing.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  FINE:  $379.00 & $200.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid at $25.00 per month, commencing 4/15/16, alternate 11 days jail if not paid)

**Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.**

Letter dated 02/01/16 filed by Atty Williams Buttery.
